content:
There must be just retribution for everything that has been done by Russian murderers in this war and for the sake of Putin's power for life.

About thisreportedPresident of Ukraine Volodymyr Zelenskyy.

“These days, the Russian dictator mimics the next election. Everyone in the world is clear that this figure, as it was often in history, just got sick of power and does everything to rule for life, ”the head of state said.

There is no such evil, the President of Ukraine, who does not commit Putin, says to extend his personal power. And there is no one in the world who would be immune to it.

“Everything that Russia does in the occupied territory of Ukraine is a crime. For everything that was done by Russian killers in this war and for the sake of Putin's lifelong power, there should be a fair retribution. He is most afraid of just one - justice. There is no legitimacy in this election imitation and can not be. This figure should end the defendants in the Hague in the Hague - this is what we have to provide, ”he said.

Volodymyr Zelensky thanked every state, every leader, to all international organizations that "call and call things by their names."
title: President on Putin's "elections": This figure should end on the defendants in the Hague
description: This was reported by President of Ukraine Volodymyr Zelenskyy. “These days are Russian ...
author: Army Inform
